EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2019-01-23 Cloud Status Quo.ES-2019-01-22 Invite 4b.ES 4b
EmailTemplate.subject: See you today?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-cloud-status-quo/?utm_campaign=7012o000001oRHEAA2]]>
Register & Enter to Win $100 Amazon Gift Card <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-cloud-status-quo/?utm_campaign=7012o000001oRHEAA2]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Gartner predicts that by 2020, organizations that lack cost optimization processes will, on average, overspend in the cloud by 40%. It doesn't have to be this way for you and your team.
Register Now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-cloud-status-quo/?utm_campaign=7012o000001oRHEAA2]]>
Join Mor Cohen, CTO of Cloud at Turbonomic, today at 11 AM ET for the “How to Beat the Cloud Status Quo <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-cloud-status-quo/?utm_campaign=7012o000001oRHEAA2]]>” webinar, where you will find out the key factors that drive cost optimization, how to quantifiably improve performance, and how to reduce costs in the cloud.
Register and you'll be entered to win a $100 Amazon Gift Card. I hope to see you there.
Thanks, Andrew
PS. If you can't attend, register anyway <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-cloud-status-quo/?utm_campaign=7012o000001oRHEAA2]]> and I'll send you the recording afterward.
